TopicTitle: [WIP - 0.25] Squad HD Re-texture Project - Continuous Release (July 25)

Articles.Content: It looks very good, it's hard to wait even a week=)

My friend all engines are awesome...only one suggest about Nuclear engine,please don't replace the Nuclear symbol with the "N" letter,i believe is more nice with the symbol!

When the release?

My friend all engines are awesome...only one suggest about Nuclear engine,please don't replace the Nuclear symbol with the "N" letter,i believe is more nice with the symbol!

When the release?

Yeah, the symbol isn't just there for decoration, it's an official warning sign.

Yeah, the symbol isn't just there for decoration, it's an official warning sign.

You have right!

I'll give it a touch. But I'll play world of tanks for now. hehe

Edit: BTW, I think I'll give the radial engine a go next.

Edited March 26, 2014 by blackheart612

You have right!

It's actually "you are right". Where are you from? Apparently, there's quite a lot of countries where "right" is something you have and not something you are.

There are four liquid fuel engines left, I'll launch an alpha by then. Maybe a week more or less if I am fast.

wow O.O take your time then if you think your that close to getting an alpha out.

don't want to have textures with full TLC and some without

Found the guy who likes mattes! I like mattes too. That brings out the bumps though. I'll see what I can do with that.

I love mattes too. That's probably why I avoid most of AIES' parts outside of the comms and utilities folders. Glossy or shiny parts look out of place on modern rockets. ( I'd probably make exception the the Singularity Research dev three though)

Here's the not-so-used engine:

Also, the real nervas were shiny tho

You guys are definitely right, the trefoil looks cooler (scarier actually)

Uh shiiiiiny This looks way to awesome..... I want it even more now...
Veeery nice. I'd only decrease the reflectivity a bit. Rockets are never this shiny. I probably wont have enough CPU do run this shader though. Can you make those textures optional?
Yeah.... but... but.... they are just experiments not meant to be release. XD sure sure
Well there's no way for me to know that unless you say it.
Nobody said I can't release it though

Also, the real nervas were shiny tho

Not that shiny though

ALso, just a quick heads up, a nuclear warning symbol should have a thin yellow border
It has a fairly thing yellow border lol. Also, it was just experimental, really. Stock configs of the reflection plugin
I see... well, I'm jolly looking forward to it all the same!
Love the idea of this mod, keep it up
very good work, can't wait to see what you do with the fueltanks

A few pages back, I have been working on tanks for fun.

Here's the mini engine:

I guess that's 3 engines left. Then I have to convert them to mbm. So you could overwrite squad parts cause that's what I am planning atm :3

Edited March 28, 2014 by blackheart612
Could you make the 3 man command pod look more like the Apollo CM so s lightly shiny?

Just wanted to throw in my 2 cents: This is looking really good! I'll definitely be downloading this as soon as it's available. I absolutely cannot stand the look of Squad's engines, so this will allow me to actually start using them now, lol!

Keep up the great work!
Thanks for support, guys, really couldn't have continued this without you

I guess that's 3 engines left. Then I have to convert them to mbm. So you could overwrite squad parts cause that's what I am planning atm :3

Edit: Derp, I frgot, I also should rework the topside of Skipper XD

Could you somehow link this in with Universe or Texture Replacer (I don't know who uses what anymore), so the stock textures simply don't load and are instead harmlessly swapped out? Overwriting things makes uninstalling the mod a little harder, if the user wishes to do so :\

Also (sorry if you've covered this, i'm on a slow internet connection and cant afford to flick though dozens of image heavy forum pages) - what are the texture map sizes for all these parts? You've done amazing work here, but if that mini engine above is the 48-7S , those textures are incredibly dense for such a small part. Are they easily resized?

Resized to 1024*1024. Well, as I have been informed, TR or UR dont replace GameData textures so best hopes on Texture Management on tha one. That's the plan for the loading part.

Ill try with the Apollo pod.

BTW, as for the alpha, it will be an overwrite install. I'll work with the texture management on future release

Edited March 29, 2014 by blackheart612
